messages.message:
PR for making react-query refetch on window refocus: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57136
If people are okay with this, I'd love to get it in today so that we can test it a bunch before code cut.

i wonder if this will impact frontend performance for Build @CJ :thinking_rotating:

refetching individual stale queries can’t be worse than reloading the page though, so probably won’t matter too much if we fix the underlying issues that we’ve yet to uncover?
we're already slow on window focus, it's fine
